channel.title: bhaskar359's Blog
channel.description: I write mostly about web development, tech related, and sometime about my personal life.

item.title: Observables
item.description: Observables are not like EventEmitters nor are they like Promises for multiple values. Observables may act like EventEmitters in some cases, namely when they are multicasted using RxJS Subjects, but usually they don't act like EventEmitters.
item.author: bhaskarnarendra359@gmail.com (Venkata Narasimha Bhaskar Divi)
